name: OptometristAndOphthalmologistTaxonomyHDTaxonomy
title: Optometrist and Ophthalmologist Taxonomy HD Taxonomy
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for Diabetic Retinal Eye Exam Taxonomy codes.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute Diabetic Retinal Eye Exam Taxonomy codes, for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath),(Data Element Scope: Diabetic Retinal Eye Exam care need for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: Diabetic Retinal Screening Taxonomy Codes that constitute the Diabetic Retinal Eye Exam care need for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
